statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Stephen Croone scored 31 points on 7-of-15 shooting and made 13 of 16 free throws as Furman rallied with a big second-half run to beat Mercer 85-74 on Saturday.
article.headline: Furman rallies to beat Mercer 85-74 behind Croone's 31
article.linkText: Furman rallies to beat Mercer 85-74 behind Croone's 31
article.story: GREENVILLE, S.C. -- Stephen Croone scored 31 points on 7-of-15 shooting and made 13 of 16 free throws as Furman rallied with a big second-half run to beat Mercer 85-74 on Saturday. Trailing by three at halftime, Croone tied it at 42 with a 3-pointer, then hit back-to-back 3s and Furman led 56-49 with 13:26 left. Croone scored five points amid a 15-2 run and the Paladins pulled away 80-61 with 4:08 to play. Mercer finished with a 13-5 run in which Jaylen Stowe scored seven points but couldn't catch up. Kris Acox scored 14 points on 7-of-7 shooting, Devin Sibley added 12 points with four assists and the Paladins (17-11, 11-4 Southern Conference) made 9 of 27 3-pointers and 24 of 31 free throws. Stephon Jelks scored 17 points, Jordan Strawberry added 15 and Cory Kilby had a career-high 13 for Mercer (18-9, 8-6), which has lost three straight.
